title: Cloud ATT&CK Mapping
description: Schema for YAML of the Cloud ATT&CK Mapping format

version.description: The version of this data mapping format.

ATT&CK version.description: The version of the ATT&CK (Cloud) matrix used to source the techniques included in this mapping.

date.description: Last update time?  Creation time?  Maybe add a field for both?

name.description: The name of the security control being mapped in this file.

author.description: The name of the author of this mapping file.

contact.description: The email address  of the author of this mapping file.

organization.description: The organization that produced this mapping file.

platform.description: The cloud platform of the security control being mapped in this file.

tags.description: Will enable the mapping tool to produce coverage visualizations (e.g. ATT&CK Navigator) by aggregating security controls by these tag values.

description.description: The description of the security control

techniques.description: List of technique objects that describe the ATT&CK Cloud techniques that the control is able to offer protection.

id.description: The ID of the ATT&CK technique.

name.description: The name of the ATT&CK technique.

sub-techniques.description: List of Sub-technique objects that describe the specific sub-techniques of this technique that this control provides protection against.

id.description: The ID of the ATT&CK sub-technique.

name.description: The name of the ATT&CK sub-technique.

scores.description: List of Score objects that provides an assessment (score) of the effectiveness of the prevent, detect, and/or response protections provided by the security control for this ATT&CK cloud sub-technique.

comment.description: A description of the justification for the assessed score.

comments.description: A description of any assumptions that were made while producing this mapping.

references.description: A description of any useful references for understanding the data contained in this mapping.
